column4: Hello Ubuntu, quick question, i just want to know that can i change/rename my interfaces for eg. eth1 to eth0? thx.
Yes, I can't help you with it though, i don't know them in my head. But google them. :-)
hardluck still not luck yet :< for "udev-rules."
there is two lines one for "pcnet32" has eth0 and one for "vmxnet" has eth1
Change eth1 and eth0 to whatever you wish.
i want to change my eth1 to eth0
And change "eth0" to "eth1" or something else then "eth0".
after that reboot the system ? or just restart the adaptor?
You could restart udev, but it's easiest to restart the computer.
Thanks Alot.. its fine now. but 1 quick question after that my Ip got change .. can i set my OLD ip again ? whatever eth1 had?
